name: Lava in Maze - Live Labyrinth
description:
Solve maze, control a lava bubble that runs through the maze. Bubble moves according to the accelerometer.

Choose between 4 levels: easy, normal, difficult & extrem. Depending level, maze is larger & complex, so it takes a higher concentration. Concentration is important because the lava bubble can’t touch the walls of the labyrinth.

Characteristics:
- See the construction.
- The game can be paused briefly and have a full view of the maze, good time to decide the strategy to follow.
